  • java.lang.Object

  • @Component
public class SparqlResourceAttributeFinderModule
extends org.jboss.security.xacml.sunxacml.finder.AttributeFinderModule
    Finds resource attributes via a configured set of SPARQL queries.
    Author:
    Gregory Jansen
